intro: Leiospora bellidifolia, commonly known as the bellidifolia leiospora, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that are typically pink or white in color. The plant has hairy stems and leaves that are ovate to lanceolate in shape. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of the Americas. Leiospora bellidifolia is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories or along stream banks.
